wikipedia_page.main: Peter Sproule (born 1947) is an English actor. His roles include a guest appearance on an early episode of Upstairs, Downstairs. He trained at the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art and made his first appearance at the Bristol Old Vic in 1968.
